name: Escape the Laboratory
description:
After many experiments, you are the remaining slime in the laboratory. Before the doctor can conduct the last experiment, find clues to escape while the doctor is away!

(Use the arrow keys to move. Only by the exit can you click ENTER to uncover a hint. The exit is the only place you can input the passcode.)

- - - - - 

Sprites credits:

Map- Mother 3 (JPN)

Slime- Candies 'n Curses
